grade: Jōyō kanji, taught in junior high
on reading compounds: 拠点【キョテン】position, location, base, point, site
急遽【キュウキョ】hurriedly, in a hurry, in haste, sudden
群雄割拠【グンユウカッキョ】rivalry of local warlords, a number of powerful (talented, influential) persons standing by themselves in a given field
有罪証拠【ユウザイショウコ】corpus delicti
補強証拠【ホキョウショウコ】corroboration, supporting evidence
kun reading compounds: 因る【よる】to be due to, to be caused by, to depend on, to turn on, to be based on, to come from, to be based at (a location, an organization), to be headquartered at
